Meet Your Chiropractor

Dr. Liz Borham

(Chiropractor)

Dr. Liz sees her role as a chiropractor as being a partner with people who want to achieve health and wellness goals. Her aim is to have people of all ages feeling and functioning as well as they can. She loves chiropractic for its focus on health from the 'inside out' and she loves ABC for its powerful, consistent, measurable results. Liz has trained with world leaders in ABC technique both in Australia and internationally and takes pride in continually refining her skills.
